text: Mbega wamubonye umwe yagira ivyo yishakiye kubwiwe yuko ariwe Mana yiwe n’Imana ica imureka uko nyene ngo azimire hamwe nuko afise ubumenyi, mugabo Imana ica itera ikidodo hejuru y’amatwi yiwe no kumutima wiwe nuguca ishira ikiganza cayo kumaso yiwe, none ni nde azomu rongora munyuma y’Imana, mbega mwebwe ntimwibuka
